ghostPost.title: v1.12.2 - Hotfix
ghostPost.html: prosemirror-schema tarball were broken due to new update. This release fixes the installation flow for Caprover and Heroku by using git instead tarball.
ghostPost.excerpt:
prosemirror-schema tarball were broken due to new update. This release fixes the
installation flow for Caprover and Heroku by using git instead tarball.
